abilities.name: ZERO
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown Z is on your Bench and you have no cards in your deck, you may discard all cards attached to Unown Z and put Unown Z on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Remove as many damage counters as you like from each Unown you have in play. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pok√©mon.
